name: Black cat meow meow at night
name_original: Black cat meow meow at night
description:
BLACK CAT MEOW MEOW AT NIGHT :3

Gaem made for GC Jam 4 ( http://itch.io/jam/gc-jam-4 )

You play as a witch's black cat.
The witch got lost in the town, and you have to find her.
Have fun!

CONTROLS:
 - WASD, ARROWS and D-PAD to move around
 - J, SPACE, and A BUTTON to jump

CREDITS:
A gaem by Apple Horo ( http://applehoro.itch.io )

KAWAI ACR20 Drum kit
Royalty free and public domain samples from samples.kb6.de ( http://samples.kb6.de )

UPD: Post-jam version, specially for k00l.cat( https://k00lcat.itch.io )

Now the cat is blinking when charge, and doesn't stop when do so.
Thanx for feedback :3
